rows.label: tlk45320121_02_msg0001
rows.name:
We've been out here trying to recruit
Drivers for some time now...

rows.label: tlk45320121_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But I've yet to clap eyes on a Blade
with a unique ability!

rows.label: tlk45320121_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm talking about Blades that excel in
Fortitude or Focus, or have a
specialized field of knowledge...

rows.label: tlk45320121_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Seems the chances of meeting
such exceptional individuals are
few and far between!

rows.label: tlk45320121_02_msg0005
rows.name:
But I expect that if you stick it out
and keep trying, sooner or later you'll
end up resonating with a winner!
